content.rendered:
Experience our

Outdoor Swimming Pool

Introduction of Swimming Academy

Kings Club Swimming Academy is set up on an International Standard with top quality materials & lighting equipment. Landscaping and wall cladding of the pool is built with utmost care. The filtration equipments are installed in the swimming pool to provide crystal clear water to the pool. Our swimming academy involves professional, highly trained, motivated instructors who are passionate about teaching swimming.
Learn to swim for health, safety, fun and fitness & get well-prepared for competitive swimming. We specialize in small group teaching by skillful and certified instructors. We provide priority to the safety and optimal learning of the students. Our instructors have pertinent teaching experience from beginners to competitive standards.

Features, Amenities & Benefits

  • You can swim in a temperature-controlled environment.
  • Wind, rain, or other weather events keep you away from your daily swim
  • You do not need to worry about leaves, pods, & plant debris clogging the system
  • You can swim any time of day or night
  • It is a great place for a spool or swim spa which is smaller than most pools but still provides aquatic exercise
  • It also guarantees ultimate swimming conditions year-round.
  • There are also reserved timing for women.
  • Locker facility provides security. It assists children to keep their things such as mobiles and other valuables safely in one place.
  • There is also a facility of changing room/ rest room/ shower area.
  • It involves professional, highly trained, motivated instructors who are passionate about teaching swimming.
  • All our lessons are safe, fun, progressive, and comprehensive.
  • We provide a “swimming lesson progress card” that allows parents/guardians to continually monitor their child’s progress.

Benefits

  • All-time access: You can always enjoy an indoor swimming pool in any month & in any season. Swimming is great for physical health. You can have a relaxing atmosphere at an indoor pool.
  • Better temperature control: You & your family can easily control the temperature of the pool water with the help of automatic pool covers & heating systems of our swimming pools. They assist you to set an ambient temperature as per your preferences.
  • Less use of chemicals: The swimming pools at Kings Club are settled inside the structure that makes it completely sheltered from the UV rays received from direct sunlight. Because of the UV rays, the water will need sanitization & chlorination as much as possible & the UV rays do not meet the water inside the indoor swimming pool.
  • Experienced Coaches: All swimmers are continuously assessed and certificates awarded for achievements. The students are not pressurized or pushed to perform even guided to develop their skills. The children will be developing self-confidence and a sense of accomplishment with every new stroke.

Types of Classes

Previous
Next
  • Infant swimming classes: Kings Club Swimming Academy is one of the perfect places of learning for infants as young as 3 years.
  • Aqua fit classes: Our aqua fit classes are a unique blend of aqua aerobics and swimming that make the ultimate fitness session with a lot of fun and high calorie burning.
  • Summer swimming camps: The camps are designed in suitable timings and favorably isolated into batches for children, women and a combination of all.
  • Basic & advanced training: Our basic and advanced training sessions are passionate and focused training programs to benefit swimmers in competitions and include stroke correction, technique & timing improvement.

Upcoming Sports Calendar

Kings Club provides sports facilities & events to people of every age from children right up to senior citizens. This all makes Kings Club a unique & special & magnificent place to be a home away from home.
Camp 1Camp 2Camp 3
From 30th March to 19th AprilFrom 20th April to 10th MayFrom 11th May to 31st May

*18 sessions; Swimming Pool will remain closed on Sundays

Classes open for all age groups from 4 years & above for all 3 Levels

About Coaching Partner

Our coaches are upskilled to the highest standards. The team Matsya comes with immense expertise and experience with over three decades of association in the sport of swimming. The trainers’ and coaches’ strength revolves around teaching the accurate techniques of swimming while assisting members to take up swimming not just as a sport but as a lifestyle.

Gallery

Testimonials

I am glad share my experience, Its been very good, Professional trainers, Well maintained pool and motivational thoughts. I was thinking swimming is very difficult before joining but its very very easy now...

Kiran

Very Good place to swim. Coaching is available. Coach is really good

Yogesh

Knowledgeable, very patient and encouraging coaches. We liked their attitude. Neatly maintained, advanced filtering & no chlorine. Really awesome place to swim...

Srinidhi Adiga

Very good facility for kids and adults alike to learn swimming... Very good coaches as well

Basavaraj

FAQ

1. When can my child start swimming lessons with Kings Club?
Kings Club Swimming Academy takes children from 3 years of age. It is the age when most children are confident and independent enough to be given instructions by a coach without needing parent support.
2. Why is it important for them to learn to swim?
Swimming is an important life skill. We teach the children to swim & become the best swimmers.
3. My child's scared of the water, how can I encourage them to swim?
It is very common for children to be nervous or even afraid of swimming. Our creative methods get them to believe in themselves very fast. There are adequate things you can do at home to encourage water confidence such as making bath time fun, picking up toys from the bottom of the bath.
4. How many children do you have in each class? Why is it better to have small class-sizes?
Every class has 3 students because the teacher-student ratio enables us to cover a huge amount of content in every lesson and also enables us to sharpen their skills.
5. I can't swim, do I have to be in the pool with my children, and can I still learn at my age?
We encourage all parents to be out of the water and leave the teaching completely to us.
6. How quickly will my children learn to swim?
Each child will progress at their own pace so some are noticeably quicker than others at taking to the water. We ensure that your child will progress quicker with us than they would with any other swim school.
7. Do you still give swimming badges to children? Why?
We provide reward to every single student in our weekly lesson program for all of their hard work.
8. Where are your swimming classes held?
Our swimming pools are luxurious, warm, & clean. Our location has been carefully chosen to give you and your children a 5-star service.
9. Why should parents choose Kings Club Swimming Academy rather than their local leisure center classes?
You will get the results as you pay for and can be assured of a very different level of service to what you will experience anywhere else. Our trainers are world-class and our pools provide a relaxed environment with no distractions.
10. Which Class is Right For My Child?
Kings Club Swimming Academy include the following types of classes:
  • Suitable for children who are complete beginners with little or no water experience.
  • Suitable for children who have been in the water before but are by no means swimming independently. We evolve basic safety awareness and water confidence skills.
  • Suitable for children who are on the verge of swimming independent doggy paddle. We work on evolving safe entries to the water, including jumping in, travel on the front and back up to a distance of five meters, and rotating the body to take back an upright position.
  • Suitable for children who can swim 10 – 15m of a basic front crawl, backstroke and breast stroke. This stage assists the learner in developing the understanding of buoyancy through a range of skills.
  • Suitable to expand on other water based skills like sculling, treading water and body complete rotation.
  • Suitable for children who can swim all 4 strokes well. Children also learn about details of water safety and about preparing appropriately for exercise.
  • Suitable for children to develop quality stroke techniques up to 100metres incorporating the skills they have learned, and combine them to develop a linked routine.
